snippet: Street vendors who work a stretch of East 161st Street near Yankee Stadium in the Bronx say a fatal shooting last week, in which police say one seller shot two others, was bound to happen.
abstract: Street vendors who work a stretch of East 161st Street near Yankee Stadium have been shaken by incident in which vendor Horace Coleman shot and killed one competitor and wounded another; many of them say the occurrence, though extreme, was not unexpected in a business where turf wars can escalate to dangerous levels.
lead_paragraph: Street vendors who work a stretch of East 161st Street near Yankee Stadium in the Bronx say a fatal shooting last week, in which police say one seller shot two others, was bound to happen.

headline.seo: Sidewalk Vendors’ Turf Wars Sometimes Become Violent
headline.main: As Vendors Hustle for Space, Tempers Flare
headline.print_headline: As Vendors Hustle for Space, Tempers Flare
